item.title: 亚马逊宣布开展为期四天的 Prime Day 折扣活动
item.description: 亚马逊公司周二宣布，该公司一年一度的 Prime Day 促销活动定于 7 月 8 日至 7 月 11 日举行，与去年相比，活动时间从两天延长至四天。【原文：Amazon.com's annual Prime Day sales event is scheduled for July 8 through July 11, expanding to four days from two days compared to last year, the company announced on Tuesday.】

item.title: 解说：日本央行为何调整购买日本国债的计划？
item.description: 最近几周，随着收益率的飙升为负债累累的日本政府敲响了警钟，一向平静的日本政府债券（JGB）市场吸引了全球的目光。【原文：The normally sedate Japanese government bond (JGB) market has attracted global attention in recent weeks as a surge in yields sounded warnings for deeply indebted governments.】

item.title: 早间竞标以色列-伊朗停战希望破灭
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 投资者对日本央行维持利率不变决定的反应
item.description: 日本央行周二维持利率稳定，并表示明年将放慢缩减购债规模的步伐，这表明日本央行将以谨慎的态度来解除长达十年之久的货币刺激政策。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept its interest rates steady on Tuesday and said it would slow the pace of reduction in its bond purchases next year, signalling a cautious approach to unwinding its decade-long monetary stimulus.】

item.title: 研究发现，中国汽车制造商在零排放汽车市场中占据重要领先地位
item.description: 据研究机构国际清洁交通理事会（ICCT）称，中国汽车制造商正在全球零排放汽车（ZEV）市场上迅速领先。【原文：Chinese automakers are rapidly pulling ahead in the global zero-emission vehicle (ZEV) market, according to research firm International Council on Clean Transportation (ICCT).】

item.title: 泰国财政部长表示泰国将于本周向美国提交正式贸易提案
item.description: 泰国财政部长周二表示，泰国的正式贸易提案将于本周提交美国，第一轮讨论将在网上进行，泰国正努力避免美国的关税威胁。【原文：Thailand's formal trade proposal will be submitted to the United States this week, with the first round of discussions set to take place online, the country's finance minister said on Tuesday, as it seeks to head off the threat of U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 瑞典军方与特里亚、爱立信携手推动国防科技发展
item.description: 瑞典武装部队周二加入了特里亚和爱立信的 5G 创新计划，以加强北约联盟内部的军事通信、后勤、安全和支持互操作性。【原文：The Swedish Armed Forces on Tuesday joined Telia and Ericsson's 5G innovation program to strengthen military communications, logistics, security and support interoperability within the NATO alliance.】

item.title: 维托尔首席执行官认为今年美国石油产量将因价格下跌而略有下降
item.description: 顶级能源贸易商维托尔公司（Vitol）首席执行官周二表示，由于价格下降，他预计今年美国的石油产量将略有减少。【原文：The chief executive of top energy trader Vitol expects a slight reduction in U.S. oil production this year due to lower prices, he said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本央行决定放慢债券缩减速度，保持利率稳定
item.description: 日本央行周二维持利率稳定，并决定从下一财年开始放慢削减债券购买规模的步伐，这表明日本央行倾向于谨慎行事，使依然宽松的货币政策正常化。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept interest rates steady on Tuesday and decided to slow the pace of reduction in its bond purchases from next fiscal year, signalling its preference to move cautiously in normalising still-easy monetary policy.】

item.title: 世界银行：随着经济增长放缓，太平洋岛屿应促进妇女就业
item.description: 世界银行在周二的一份新报告中说，由于过时的法律和其他障碍，太平洋岛屿上只有不到一半的工作年龄妇女能够就业。【原文：Less than half of working age women are employed across the Pacific Islands due to outdated laws and other barriers, the World Bank said in a new report on Tuesday, and said closing the gender gap could boost economic growth.】

item.title: 央视称英伟达将于七月参加中国供应链博览会
item.description: 据中国中央电视台周二报道，美国芯片巨头英伟达（Nvidia）将参加七月份在北京举行的大型供应链博览会。【原文：U.S. chip giant Nvidia will attend a major supply-chain expo in July in Beijing, according to a report from China state broadcaster CCTV on Tuesday.】

item.title: 壳牌首席执行官称当地价格指数使加拿大液化天然气项目具有吸引力
item.description: 壳牌公司首席执行官周二表示，买家之所以青睐壳牌的加拿大液化天然气项目，是因为该项目以加拿大阿尔伯塔能源公司（AECO）的价格指数为基准，该指数低于美国的亨利枢纽（Henry Hub）价格。【原文：Buyers are attracted to Shell's LNG Canada project because it uses the Canadian Alberta Energy Company (AECO) price index as a benchmark, which is lower than the Henry Hub price in the U.S., the company's chief executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普呼吁德黑兰撤军，股市下滑，原油跳涨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普呼吁所有人撤离德黑兰，以色列与伊朗的战斗已进入第五天，这令投资者担心会爆发更广泛的地区冲突。【原文：U.S. stock futures slipped and oil prices rose on Tuesday, as investors were rattled by U.S. President Donald Trump's call for everyone to evacuate Tehran with the fifth-day of Israel-Iran fighting sowing fears of a broader regional conflict.】

item.title: 条款书显示，软银通过出售 T-Mobile 股份融资 48 亿美元
item.description: 根据路透社查阅的一份条款书，日本软银以每股 224 美元的价格出售了 2150 万股 T-Mobile 股票，筹集了 48 亿美元。【原文：Japan's SoftBank raised $4.8 billion from a sale of 21.5 million T-Mobile shares at $224 each, according to a term sheet reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 日本央行利率决议前美元上涨，日元持稳
item.description: 由于中东地区持续的紧张局势仍然令投资者感到恐慌，并在等待各国央行即将做出的决定，美元在周二小幅走强，但大多数货币仍维持在较窄的区间内。【原文：The dollar firmed slightly on Tuesday though most currencies held tight ranges as investors remained spooked by ongoing tensions in the Middle East and awaited upcoming central bank decisions.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔时隔七年重新开放采矿特许权登记册
item.description: 厄瓜多尔矿业部周一宣布，七年来首次启动新的特许权登记制度，以吸引更多的采矿项目进入这个南美国家，并遏制非法采矿活动。【原文：Ecuador's mining ministry announced on Monday the launch of a new registry of concessions for the first time in seven years in an effort to attract more mining projects to the South American country and curb illegal operations.】

item.title: 伊朗-以色列冲突引发供应担忧，油价上涨
item.description: 由于伊朗和以色列之间的紧张局势加剧，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普敦促 "所有人 "撤离德黑兰，该地区动荡加深和石油供应中断的可能性增大，周二油价攀升超过2%。【原文：Oil prices climbed over 2% on Tuesday as Iran-Israel tension intensified and U.S. President Donald Trump urged "everyone" to evacuate Tehran, increasing the prospect of deepening unrest in the region and disruption to oil supply.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，礼来接近以 13 亿美元收购基因编辑生物技术公司 Verve Therapeutics
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周一报道，礼来公司正在就收购基因编辑初创公司 Verve Therapeutics 进行深入谈判，收购价最高可达 13 亿美元，旨在加强其实验药物产品线。【原文：Eli Lilly is in advanced talks to acquire gene editing startup Verve Therapeutics for up to $1.3 billion, aiming to strengthen its pipeline of experimental medicines, the Financial Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 报告显示，美国新闻消费者正在转向播客乔-罗根，远离传统新闻来源
item.description: 周二发布的一份报告显示，乔-罗根（Joe Rogan）等知名播客和人工智能聊天机器人在美国的新闻传播中发挥着越来越大的作用，导致传统媒体受到进一步侵蚀。【原文：Prominent podcasters like Joe Rogan are playing a bigger role in news dissemination in the United States, as are AI chatbots, contributing to the further erosion of traditional media, according to a report released on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国为航空旅行清洁技术投资 3.4 亿美元
item.description: 英国表示将投资 2.5 亿英镑（约合 3.4 亿美元）用于使航空旅行更环保的技术，支持零排放飞行、激光束制造和减少飞机阻力的研究，以帮助促进英国航空航天业的发展。【原文：Britain said it would invest 250 million pounds ($340 million) in technology to make air travel greener, backing research into zero-emission flying, laser-beam manufacturing and cutting aircraft drag, to help boost the country's aerospace industry.】

item.title: 壳牌调查显示：欧洲比美国更愿意改用电动汽车
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell）周二公布的一项调查显示，驾驶者越来越不愿意从内燃机汽车转向电动汽车，而且这种趋势在欧洲比在美国更为明显。【原文：Drivers are becoming more reluctant to switch to electric vehicles from combustion engines and the trend is more pronounced in Europe than in the United States, a survey published by Shell on Tuesday showed.】

item.title: 据当地媒体报道，巴西监管机构暂停召开 Marfrig-BRF 交易股东大会
item.description: 据《O Globo》周一报道，巴西证券监管机构 CVM 暂停了就牛肉加工商 Marfrig 收购家禽和猪肉加工商 BRF 事宜进行表决的特别股东大会。【原文：Brazilian securities regulator CVM suspended an extraordinary shareholder meeting to vote on the takeover of poultry and pork processor BRF by beef processor Marfrig , newspaper O Globo reported on Monday.】

item.title: 美国住宅建筑商莱纳尔（Lennar）销售额增长，季度收入超出预期
item.description: 本周一，Lennar 公司的第二季度收入超过了华尔街的预期，因为其对购房者的激励措施提升了销售额。【原文：Lennar's second-quarter revenue beat Wall Street estimates on Monday, as its incentives for home buyers lifted sales.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，软银寻求通过出售 T-Mobile 股份筹资 49 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，日本软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp）正寻求通过未注册的隔夜大宗出售 T-Mobile 股票筹集近 49 亿美元资金。【原文：Japan's SoftBank Group Corp is looking to raise nearly $4.9 billion in an unregistered overnight block sale of T-Mobile shares, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: OpenAI 赢得 2 亿美元美国国防合同
item.description: 五角大楼在周一的一份声明中说，聊天软件制造商 OpenAI 获得了一份价值 2 亿美元的合同，为美国国防部提供人工智能工具。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI was awarded a $200 million contract to provide the U.S. Defense Department with artificial intelligence tools, the Pentagon said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 参议院委员会对税收法案的修改重创美国太阳能股票
item.description: 周一，控制美国参议院财政委员会的共和党人公布了对唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面减税和支出法案的修改，将在2028年前逐步取消太阳能、风能和能源税收抵免，美国太阳能公司的股价在盘后交易中下跌。【原文：Shares of U.S. solar energy companies tumbled in extended trade on Monday after Republicans who control the U.S. Senate Finance Committee unveiled changes to President Donald Trump's sweeping tax-cut and spending bill that would phase out solar, wind and energy tax credits by 2028.】

item.title: 消息人士称，威兹航空公司即将达成为新喷气机订购普惠发动机的协议
item.description: 据两位业内消息人士透露，威兹航空公司正逐步与 RTX 旗下的普惠公司达成协议，为其已订购的 177 架空客喷气机购买发动机。【原文：Wizz Air is edging towards a deal with RTX -owned Pratt & Whitney to purchase engines for 177 of its Airbus jets already on order, according to two industry sources.】

item.title: 在 Wojcicki 提出 3.05 亿美元收购要约后，Regeneron 拒绝对 23andMe 提出更高的收购价
item.description: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals 拒绝提交对基因检测公司 23andMe 的新竞标价。 该公司的一位发言人周一告诉路透社，该公司对基因检测公司 23andMe 的出价已超过其最初的中标价格 2.56 亿美元。【原文：Regeneron Pharmaceuticals has declined to submit a new bid for genetic testing company 23andMe exceeding its original winning bid of $256 million, a company spokesperson told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 参议院共和党法案将在批准 180 天后终止 7500 美元的电动汽车税收抵免
item.description: 参议院共和党人周一提出了一项税收和预算法案，将在该法案签署成为法律180天后终止对新电动汽车的7500美元税收减免，并将在该法案批准90天后终止对二手电动汽车的4000美元税收减免。【原文：Senate Republicans on Monday proposed a tax and budget bill that would end the $7,500 tax credit on new electric vehicles 180 days after the measure is signed into law, and it would end a $4,000 used-vehicle EV tax credit 90 days after the bill's approval.】

item.title: 特朗普和斯塔默表示美英贸易协议已敲定
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）周一表示，他们已经敲定了两个盟国上个月达成的贸易协议。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump and British Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Monday said they had finalized a trade deal reached between the two allies last month.】
